name: LearnJapanese
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: learn japanese
des:
This is self-learning system for Japanese learners. You can listen to Japanese dialogue, repeat it, shadow it, or role-play a role in each scene.

[How to use]
1. Say the scene number "Number xx" you would like to practice, you can listen to Japanese dialogue in each scene. (For the English translation, see the card displayed in the activity of the Alexa app.)
2. If you say "Number xx", you can listen the same dialogue again.
3. Say "English", you can listen to English translation.
4. Say "Repeat", you can try to repeat the dialogue while spacing.
5. Say "Shadowing", you can try to shadow the dialogue.
6. Say "Role A", you can perform role-playing of Role A.
7. Say "Role B", you can perform role-playing of Role B.
8. Say "Menu" to return to the Scene List.

[Changing the dialogue speed]
Saying "fast", "medium" or "slow" will change the speed of the Japanese dialogue.

[Dialogue Text]
If you use a Echo with screen screen, you can refer to the conversation text.
* Due to the specifications of Alexa, the timing of the voice being spoken and the line being focused may occasionally be shifted. Please note.

* "Shadowing" is a language learning method where you listen to a native audio recording, and then speak it aloud at the same time as the native speaker, but without reading the text.
* "Role-playing" is an experiential learning method to enhance speaking performance by training in which participants role in a given scenario.
* I would be grateful if you could let me know your impressions and opinions using this skill from the evaluation column of the Alexa application.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
